level.heading: COMMERCIAL PERMIT PARKING PASS FEES (ยง 18-2430) The annual CPP permit fee for each commercial motor vehicle registered in thePP program shall be three hundred and twenty three dollars ($323). A company may register as many commercial motor vehicles as it owns in the CPProgram. A company that registers seventy-five (75) or more vehicles for CPP annualasses need only pay for seventy-five (75) annual passes; provided, that theompany shall use its company logo instead of the decal. Each CPP day pass shall cost twenty-five dollars ($25) and shall only be validor one (1) commercial motor vehicle.
